original_title: Essence of Healing: The Journey of American Indian Nurses
overview: Essence of Healing is a documentary exploring the life journeys of 14 American Indian nurses - their experiences growing up, their experiences in nursing school, and their experiences on the job. They are part of a larger story - a historical line of care and compassion that has run through hundreds of indigenous tribes for thousands of years.

production_companies.name: University of North Dakota's RAIN Program

title: Essence of Healing: The Journey of American Indian Nurses
